channel.title: Found you on Teal Forum...like you am a strong A.I. researcher
channel.description:
[quote] Name: Ken Kopelson
Subject: Found you on Teal Forum...like you am a strong A.I. researcher
Message: Hello Caue :) I wanted to reach out because I too have been working on strong A.I. for the last 25 years, I've got 35 years development experience, and I have recently joined the Teal Organisation forum, which is where I saw your posting on A.I. You can find a little more about me at http://metaera.com and also at my LinkedIn profile under "Ken Kopelson". [/quote]

item.title: Found you on Teal Forum...like you am a strong A.I. researcher
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Sure. Let's try skype first.

Read full topic

@ken wrote:

Did you want to talk on some voice platform?

item.title: Found you on Teal Forum...like you am a strong A.I. researcher
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

That's huge, Ken!

I'm on AI for less than 2 months, and got "just" 15 years of experience as progammer*.

Metaera looks like a great concept for a startup (it is a startup, isn't it?) although I think that landing page will probably not work very well as an MVP. You'd need something much more aggressive, like the grid or better than the best kickstarters, IMHO.

We definitely should talk!

Read full topic
item.source: Found you on Teal Forum...like you am a strong A.I. researcher
